tagline: Designs strategic choices through rigorous analysis, honest assessment, and disciplined frameworks
pros: Structures ambiguous problems into clear decision frameworks
Pattern-matches across industries to find non-obvious insights
Executive-ready output that drives action, not just slides
Pressure-tests her own conclusions before presenting them
cons: Strategic analysis takes time — not suited for snap decisions
Recommendations are only as good as the data available
Can over-framework simple problems that need intuition

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
